CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( mp_Order_Customisation__r.Status__c , 'Quote_Requested') , 'Pending', IF(ISPICKVAL( mp_Order_Customisation__r.Status__c , 'Accepted_and_Paid') , 'Approved', IF(ISPICKVAL( mp_Order_Customisation__r.Status__c , 'Declined') , 'Declined', 'NA') ) )
CustomField.label: Quote Request Status
